properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(BOARD_TYPE=BOARD_CD) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_TYPE ON(CATEGORY_TYPE=CATEGORY_CD) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN BOARD_TYPE ON(BOARD_TYPE=BOARD_CD) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_TYPE ON(CATEGORY_TYPE=CATEGORY_CD) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND CATEGORY_CD = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
